Title: Exempts the sale of fire extinguishers, smoke alarms, heat sensors and carbon monoxide detectors from sales and use taxes
Summary: Exempts the sale of fire extinguishers, smoke alarms, heat sensors and carbon monoxide detectors for residential use only from state sales and compensating use taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting the sale of fire extinguishers, smoke alarms, heat sensors and carbon monoxide detectors for residential use from sales and use taxes
